title: Illaoi's E Bug/Oversight
body:
As Illaoi, when you make an enemy a vessel, they have to (help) kill three tentacles or wait one minute for the debuff to expire. This is fine. However, if the enemy has only one more tentacle to (help) kill before removing the debuff and you *reapply* vessel, they still only have to kill one to remove it. The timer is reset to one minute, but the "tentacles remaining" counter doesn't change. I can't imagine this is anything but an accident, and it can be very frustrating to make someone a vessel, only to see them remove it after killing one tentacle. Thoughts?

*This has happened to me on several occasions. I am not sure that it happens every time, but it feels like it.

replies.body: I play her a lot,  so I understand how painful this bug is. If i recall correctly, this should have been fixed in 6.5, if not 6.6.

What about her other bugs?
Like when you Que a W then attack someone who dashes out of range during her attack animation.
The Attack misses but the W is "used" but you still have it Qued and cant use it again till the buff falls off.

Or how you get killed during her attack animation but it never hits and to Tentacles never attack.

Or how if they kill a tentacle during its attack animation it never hits.
Thank you for the quick reply! I may have missed it when reading the patch notes. Even if it isn't fixed yet, I'm glad Riot is aware.
